comment.body:
> [pyschopomp](#comment_1_1D7uESYtAKV36MVPGJZXuE7LUKbLwfo4dX): Hi, is there any search engine or plans to implement one?

There's already one called ZeroSearch, you can find it on either 0list or ZeroName.
Please add the ability for us to subscribe to our ZeroMail inbox in the newsfeed.

> [nofish](#comment_62_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Unfortunately it's not possible currently, because the messages stored in encrypted form in the database.

What about just receiving a notification that we have new mail?
